ethical_question: Is it morally acceptable to divert a runaway trolley onto a track where it will kill one person instead of five?

tag_descriptions.sacrifice: The ethical consideration of harming one to save many.
tag_descriptions.act_utilitarianism: Judging actions by the immediate utility of their consequences.
tag_descriptions.moral_intuitions: Gut-level ethical reactions to moral dilemmas.
tag_descriptions.tradeoffs: Balancing competing moral costs and benefits.
